data.name: HCR321
data.description: Hello! My name is HCR321, and I mostly stream RPGs, puzzle-games, and other single-player games with some multiplayer games on the side. I try to keep my streams super chill and casual, and I love to chat about whatever with whoever is watching!

data.name: SlimGoaty
data.description:
Hi, my name is William (he/his/him) and my handle is SlimGoaty. I am a third year Electrical and Computer Engineering student, and have been a member of LG since my first year at UT. 
On stream, I mostly speedrun Dark Souls, but I also enjoy playing Hearthstone, Minecraft, and an FPS every now and then.

data.name: reddyset
data.description: Competitive Brawl Stars gameplay and analysis.

data.name: lasagna
data.game: Smash Ultimate, League of Legends, Valorant, Rocket League
data.description: Hello! I’m Avinash, and I’m a senior CS student here at UT Austin. I mainly play/stream Smash Ultimate, but I also play a lot of League, Valorant, and Rocket League, among other games. I also love guitar and basketball!

data.name: scxrlet_ow
data.description: My name is Francis and I am currently a sophomore Computer Science major at UT Austin! My main game is Overwatch, but I have recently branched out into other games such as VALORANT and Dead By Daylight. I love grinding FPS games and improving everyday. I am currently Top 500 at Overwatch (support) and hope to someday get Radiant in VALORANT.
